mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification(notification_seq, notification_type, title, contents, is_read, created_at, link, user_seq) VALUES (notification_seq.nextval, #{notificationType}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{isRead}, sysdate, #{link}, #{userSeq})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notification WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM notification WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq} AND is_read = 0 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM notification WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq} AND is_read = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC
